snippet: The United States moves to the World Group playoff in April and will need to win to avoid falling back.
abstract: Karin Knapp beats Alison Riske, giving Italy a 3-1 win over the United States in their first-round Fed Cup match; other tennis news noted.
lead_paragraph: The United States moves to the World Group playoff in April and will need to win to avoid falling back.

headline.main: Italy Defeats U.S. in Fed Cup
headline.print_headline: Italy Defeats U.S. in Fed Cup
